text: The Primulaceae are a family of herbaceous flowering plants.Källersjö, M; Bergqvist G. & Anderberg A.A. 2000. Generic realignment in primuloid families of the Ericales s. l.: a phylogenetic analysis based on DNA sequences from three chloroplast genes and morphology. Amer. J. Bot. 87: 1325–1341. It has about 24 genera. It includes some garden plants and wildflowers. It is also called the primrose family. ==References== Category:Plant families
title: Primulaceae
